says: Life Start Safe Tween & Babysitting Program is an interative, hands-on youth program that includes a 6 hour in-person class with lots of learning.
Kids will receive a babysitter certificate upon completion.
This course is ideal for kids ages 10-13.

Topics covered: The art of babysitting, Basic first aid,  breathing emergencies, infant, child and adult CPR and AED, Age appropriate budgeting and resumes, Cooking safety, basic hygiene, internet safety.
